events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit at all, and I'd like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message was reviewed and the issue was categorized as a refund request due to size and fit.
Support agent Laura has been assigned to handle this refund request for the jacket order.
Hello! I’m Laura from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been opened or worn?
The order number is 123456789. The jacket hasn’t been worn, just tried on once, and the tags are still attached.
Thanks for the info. I have initiated the refund process. You should receive the refund within 5 to 7 business days after the return is received.
Thank you for the quick response and for starting the refund. I appreciate the help and look forward to getting the money back.
The refund case has been resolved on our end. Please mail back the jacket using the prepaid label we sent, and we will finalize the refund.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the prepaid return label and to ask if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I got the label and sent the jacket back yesterday. Thanks again for the prompt help!
We have confirmed receipt of the returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount back in your account shortly.
Your refund case is now closed. If you need any further assistance, feel free to contact us again. Thank you for your patience.
We have sent a satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience. Your feedback is valuable to us.
